title: Slack-Mini
description: Built a real-time team chat app mimicking Slack, with channel-based messaging. Integrated Firebase for authentication and real-time updates using Context API. Implemented a responsive UI to ensure smooth performance across devices.

title: Global Search Module
description: Optimized global search performance by integrating SingleStore with Spring Boot microservices, cutting complex query response times by over 40%. Enhanced search functionality with Boolean operators, filters, and travel time search capabilities.

title: Travel Time Search
description: Implemented location-based search logic using Spring Boot and Vue.js, enabling users to search candidates based on travel time from a specific location. Integrated with mapping APIs for accurate distance calculations.

title: Microservices Refactoring
description: Refactored legacy monolithic APIs into modular Spring Boot services, reducing code complexity and accelerating feature delivery timelines. Implemented proper separation of concerns and improved system maintainability.

title: AWS Infrastructure Deployment
description: Leveraged AWS services (EC2, S3, Aurora) for deploying and scaling backend infrastructure, ensuring system reliability and reducing downtime across environments. Implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments.

title: Database Schema Optimization
description: Redesigned database schema for the global search module in collaboration with product and QA teams, improving data indexing and reducing search latency by 30%. Implemented efficient query patterns and caching strategies.
